cause.description:
Pet finder’s works as a non profit organization to help animals get adopted. This organization allows pet lovers to adopt or help foster care animals in need of homes. There are various activities that you and your friends can do to participate and volunteer to help this cause. Weather you want to foster or adopt or just volunteer pet finders will be thankful for your contribution to their efforts. If you are interested in getting active with this cause go to www.Petfinder.com for more information!
1. finding animals responsible and loving homes
cause.mission: find loving homes for animals in need in our cummunity
cause.name: PET FINDER
